public class Calculator 
{
	private Integer a, b, result;
	public Calculator(){}
	public Integer sum(Integer a, Integer b){
		this.a = a;
		this.b = b;
		this.result = a + b;
		return this.result;
	}
}
Maintained by Cristiano Lemes
